seller_description: The Cable World Toys & Games 2-in-1 Kitchen Playset is a versatile pretend play toy designed as both a portable storage box and a mini kitchen playset table, doubling as a suitcase for convenient travel and play in any setting. It includes a variety of kitchen tools and accessories, perfect for engaging kids in entertaining role-play activities while encouraging the habit of organizing from an early age. This imaginative toy promotes creativity, intelligence, and independence in children, making it an excellent tool for creative play. Made from premium-quality ABS material, it is BPA-free with smooth, rounded edges, ensuring safety for kids. Easy to assemble, it offers a great opportunity for parents and kids to work together, enhancing manipulative skills and problem-solving abilities. Ideal for young chefs, this pretend play set combines fun, learning, and safe play in one compact package.
review: My daughter just loves playing with this kitchen set. It's made of good quality plastic material. Go for it guys.
